roadmap.name: To understand that neurotransmitters are chemicals that are present in the human brain and all over the body that, through an electrical impulse (e-motion, or energy in motion) to pass through one nerve cell to another, like a lock and key. Electrochemical impulses that release chemicals/hormones i.e. Serotonin, dopamine, norepinephrine, endorphins
To understand/experience that happy thoughts produce happy chemicals and negative thoughts produce negative chemicals when repeated on a sustained basis.
To learn that pituitary and adrenal glands produce neurotransmitters.
